channel.title: Save file from update?
channel.description:
okay on my server i use the "update" command which commences a server update is going to happen by the seconds indicated...
it kicks all the players and turns deadserver to true, which means no1 can login, (no1s online)
however, it doesn't save all the time
so i wanna make it so it activates savefile(); for everyone online at the time b4 they get kicked (2 seconds b4 kicked perhaps?)
any clues? :D
